flawed_nl_solution:
It will take 84 / 2 = <<84/2=42>>42 trips to fill the pool with water.
This will take Jimmy 42 trips * 20 seconds per trip = <<42*20=480>>480 seconds.
This means that Jimmy will spend 480 seconds * 1/60 = 8 minutes filling the pool.
#### 8

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 840, not 480. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
